info.overview: The test has 20 multiple-choice questions. You must score at least 15 correct answers to pass. Topics cover history, geography, institutions, and rights & responsibilities in Canada.
info.format: The test is usually administered in a supervised room and lasts about 30‚Äì45 minutes. Bring valid ID and arrive early.
info.tips: Tips: read carefully, eliminate obviously wrong answers, manage your time and skip and return if needed.
